service.name: app-issue-tracker
service.description: Comprehensive issue tracking system with AI-powered investigation and automated fix attempts using Claude Code

postgres.purpose: Store issues, agents, apps, investigation reports, and tracking data

qdrant.purpose: Vector database for semantic search of issues, similar issue detection, and knowledge base queries

redis.purpose: Caching and real-time event coordination between components

minio.purpose: Storage for investigation artifacts, logs, and fix attempt evidence

setup.description: Initialize App Issue Tracker with AI investigation capabilities

steps.name: generate-embeddings
steps.run: vrooli resource qdrant embeddings refresh --force || echo "Embeddings generation skipped (not critical)"
steps.description: Generate code embeddings for AI assistance

steps.name: install-cli
steps.description: Install issue tracker CLI command globally

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o app-issue-tracker-api main.go

steps.name: init-qdrant-collection
steps.run: curl -X PUT "http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[qdrant]}/collections/issues" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"vectors": {"size": 1536, "distance": "Cosine"}, "optimizers_config": {"default_segment_number": 2}, "replication_factor": 1}' 2>/dev/null || echo '  Collection may already exist'
steps.description: Initialize Qdrant vector collection for issue embeddings

steps.name: init-minio-bucket
steps.run: if command -v mc &> /dev/null; then mc alias set issue-tracker "http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[minio]}" "${MINIO_ACCESS_KEY:-minioadmin}" "${MINIO_SECRET_KEY:-minioadmin}" 2>/dev/null || true; mc mb issue-tracker/issue-artifacts 2>/dev/null || echo '  Bucket may already exist'; mc policy set public issue-tracker/issue-artifacts 2>/dev/null || true; else echo '  MinIO CLI not found, skipping bucket creation'; fi
steps.description: Initialize MinIO bucket for investigation artifacts

steps.name: generate-api-tokens
steps.run: PGPASSWORD="${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-postgres}" psql -h localhost -p "${RESOURCE_PORTS[postgres]}" -U "${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}" -d issue_tracker -c "UPDATE apps SET api_token = md5(random()::text || clock_timestamp()::text) WHERE api_token LIKE 'token_%';" 2>/dev/null || echo '  Token generation completed'
steps.description: Generate secure API tokens for registered apps

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo 'ðŸš€ App Issue Tracker initialized
  Dashboard: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[windmill]}/apps/issue_tracker_dashboard
  Metrics: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[windmill]}/apps/issue_tracker_metrics
  Agent Management: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[windmill]}/apps/issue_tracker_agents
  n8n workflows: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[n8n]}
  API: http://localhost:${SERVICE_PORT}
  CLI: app-issue-tracker --help'

develop.description: Start issue tracker with Go API server and all integrations

steps.name: start-api-server
steps.description: Start Go coordination API server in background

steps.name: wait-for-api
steps.description: Wait for API server to be ready

steps.name: show-running-services
steps.run:
echo 'ðŸš€ App Issue Tracker running:
  Dashboard: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[windmill]}/apps/issue_tracker_dashboard
  Metrics: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[windmill]}/apps/issue_tracker_metrics
  Agent Management: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[windmill]}/apps/issue_tracker_agents
  n8n workflows: http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[n8n]}
  API: http://localhost:$SERVICE_PORT
  CLI: app-issue-tracker --help

ðŸ’¡ Create issues with: app-issue-tracker create --title "Issue title" --description "Details" --priority high'
steps.description: Display all running service URLs and usage hints

test.description: Test issue tracker API, CLI, and integrations

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build main.go && rm test-build

steps.name: confirm-stop
steps.run: echo 'ðŸ›‘ App Issue Tracker services stopped'
